CustomField.formula: IF(TEXT(vlocity_ps__Status__c) = "Incoming", IMAGE("/resource/Incoming", "Incoming"), IF(TEXT(vlocity_ps__Status__c) = "Pending", IMAGE("/resource/Pending","Pending"), IF(TEXT(vlocity_ps__Status__c) = "Returned", IMAGE("/resource/Returned","Returned"), IMAGE("/resource/Open","Open"))))
CustomField.label: Status
